projects.title: All-in-One Business Solution
projects.description: The aim of this web application is to deliver a complete ERP solution to businesses of all sizes, allowing them to simplify activity, improve efficiency, and increase productivity.

projects.title: Collaborative Task Management System
projects.description: This web-based Collaborative Task Management System streamlines project management and enhances teamwork. With roles for Admin, Developer, Client, and Manager, it enables efficient collaboration and task handling. Built with PHP and JavaScript.

projects.title: Dealora (E-Commerce Platform)
projects.description: The aim of this project is to build a scalable and secure B2C marketplace using ASP.NET, enabling businesses to list products and consumers to easily browse, purchase, and track orders with integrated payment solutions.

projects.title: TicketReservationSystem (Easytrip)
projects.description: Windows form based windows application written in C# where an user can reserve air ticket, bus ticket simultaneously.

projects.title: Airline Reservation System
projects.description: This is a simple console-based java project Where an user can reserve air ticket.

projects.title: Blog Application
projects.description: This blog application allows users to create, update, and upload blogs, while administrators can manage blogs and bloggers. Built with NestJS for the backend, Next.js for the frontend, PostgreSQL as the database, and JWT for secure authentication, the application ensures all new users are assigned the blogger role by default, with admin roles being restricted.

about.title: Ashraful Haque
about.description: I am a passionate software Engineer skilled in building efficient, scalable solutions, designing full-stack web applications, and delivering exceptional results. Let's collaborate to create innovative and impactful projects together!
